name: Scilab
caveats:
If prompted to install the legacy Java 6, use the enableJDK tool provided by the vendor to enable installed JDK to use with scilab:

  https://www.utc.fr/~mottelet/scilab_for_macOS.html

scilab requires Java 8. You can install it with:
  brew install --cask homebrew/cask-versions/adoptopenjdk8
